description: Kaneda Maiko wears glasses and is the brains of the group. She spends most of her time reading books and using her computer. She may seem to be the quiet bookworm type, but again, her looks belie her ravenous sex drive. Maiko loves to masturbate whenever or wherever she can. Her sex drive is apparently so great that she required a gang bang to feel properly satisfied.In episode 3 she was gangbanged by a group of men composed of Morimoto Leona, Orgiwata, Suduu and the two teachers.
name: Kaneda Maiko
